sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: As Russia's war in Ukraine enters its 500th day, President Volodymyr Zelensky makes a symbolic visit to Snake Island and holds talks with ecumenical patriarch Bartholomew.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte hands in his resignation to the king after his four-party coalition collapses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky made a symbolic visit to Snake Island in the Black Sea on Saturday as Russia's war in Ukraine reached its 500th day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Moscow captured Snake Island shortly after launching its invasion on the 24th of February 2022 and Ukrainian forces retook it in June last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: According to a new United Nations report published on Friday, more than 9,000 Ukrainian civilians, including over 500 children, have lost their lives since the invasion began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: However, the report warned that the actual number of deaths may be much higher due to underreporting and limited access to some areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: underreporting and limited access to some areas. Zelensky thanked Ecumenical Patriarch Bartholomew of the Eastern Orthodox Church for his support during a meeting in Istanbul on Saturday, where they discussed a peace formula for the situation in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte visited the King to turn in the resignation of his four-party coalition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: After a breakdown between his government over migration policy, Rutte stepping down means a deeply divided Netherlands is on track for a general election later this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But he will remain in charge as a caretaker until a new government is formed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I'm really happy to hear that the government fell.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I'm not so happy with how it went and the decisions they made over the past years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Not good for the Dutch environment, the Dutch people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They need stability in this time of economical situation and of course the situation with Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Rutte has been in power since 2010 and is the Netherlands' longest serving prime minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He expressed on Friday he would like to run for a fifth term, but would consult his party before making a final decision.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: After Parliament is dissolved, a general election is expected in November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Edgar Renkiewicz has been sworn in as Latvia's new president.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In his inaugural speech, Renkiewicz pled to uphold his country's support for Ukraine against Russia and vowed to make the Baltic nation a more equal and inclusive country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He has served as Latvia's foreign minister since 2011, the country's longest serving, and becomes the first openly gay president in the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Campaigning for the Spanish general elections began Friday with opinion polls giving a slim lead to the conservative Popular Party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: After a poor performance in Spain's regional elections, Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez called con las elecciones de opinión dando un límite a la partida popular conservadora. Después de una pobre performance en las elecciones regionales en España, el primer ministro Pedro Sánchez llamó a una elección de snap en mayo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: La elección se tendrá en dos semanas. No me interesa la política porque me han defraudado todos, ni uno ni desde la derecha hasta la izquierda, todos. Feijo and the Popular Party currently lead the polls. Feijo has openly said he would consider entering government with the right-wing party Vox, which has sent alarm bells ringing amongst left-wing voters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: More than 1,000 people rallied in Paris' Place de la République to honour Adama Traore, a young black man who died in police custody in July 2016.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Demonstrators defied a ban on a commemorative march north of Paris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Around 30 similar demonstrations are planned across the country this weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It follows last week's riots sparked by the death of Nahal, a 17-year-old of Algerian heritage who was shot by police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Government spokesman Olivier Véran criticized the organizations for planning demonstrations in major cities that have not yet recovered from the rampages. In Strasbourg the march organized by several left-wing organizations has reviewed its route following a decree prohibiting the historic city center. In Marseille too, following the riots and because of the high influx of tourists in the city centre, the police issued an order prohibiting any demonstration or protest rally from 10am to midnight this Saturday.
